## <picture><img src = "https://github.com/7oSkaaa/7oSkaaa/blob/main/Images/about_me.gif?raw=true" width = 50px></picture> About me

<picture> <img align="right" src="https://github.com/7oSkaaa/7oSkaaa/blob/main/Images/Right_Side.gif?raw=true" width = 250px></picture>

<br><br>

- 👨‍💼: I am a `Senior Accountant` at [City : Raipur,]([http://suez.edu.eg/ar/%d9%83%d9%84%d9%8a%d8%a9-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%ad%d8%a7%d8%b3%d8%a8%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d9%88%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b9%d9%84%d9%88%d9%85%d8%a7%d8%aa/](https://maps.app.goo.gl/6z8YikhbrVEuMJBc7)) [Chhattisgarh ,India]([http://suez.edu.eg/ar/](https://maps.app.goo.gl/apLNWCdFnHgcMbZTA)).
- :technologist: I love using Software as a solution for every `Problem`.
- :computer: I am a beginer programmer
- :student: I’m currently learning `Quskit` `Quantum Circuit` and `ML Algo`.
- :nerd_face: Always `learning new things`.
- :thinking: I’m currently open for a new `job opportunity`, this is [MY RESUME]().
- :boom: You can visit [MY WEBSITE]().
<br>
